name: Jeepers! You're a Reaper!
description:
Congrats! You are dead! And now you are tasked with reaping the souls that have been forgotten!

Welcome to the world of dun dun dun! GRIM REAPERS! 

Meet lovable little characters and help fulfil their final wishes so they can FINALLY be at peace. 

Features:

- A delightful cast of characters all with unique and quirky dialogue.

- Short and sweet and to the point. The game can be finished in around 15-30 minutes depending on how good your problem solving skills are.

- Cuuuuuuuute halloween graphics and audio so catchy, it's spoopy!

NOTE: This game was created in about 1 month for the Hawktober Game Jam!
